attributes.action: Ban using spot lights or fog lights in addition to head lights except in poor visibility
attributes.additional_details:
Will you please strengthen the law  to prevent  drivers blinding and dazzling other drivers  when they use Spot lights or Fog lights  in   addition to their headlights   when the weather conditions are normal.

Driving at night these days  is made hell by  other drivers who fail to obey the Highway Code.
